title: NeuroSwarm Updates & Announcements
content:
NeuroSwarm Updates & Announcements

Stay up-to-date with the latest developments, announcements, and community activities in the NeuroSwarm ecosystem.

ğŸš€ Latest Announcements

NeuroSwarm Governance System Now Live!

November 12, 2025

NeuroSwarm is excited to announce the launch of our comprehensive Knowledge Base and Governance System!

What's New:

  • Complete Knowledge Base: Getting Started, Contributor Onboarding, Governance System, Community Resources, Technical Documentation, and Transparency & Logs
  • Governance System Features: Badge-weighted voting, proposal lifecycle, working groups, and real-time transparency
  • Enhanced Features: Smart search, SEO optimization, analytics, and mobile responsiveness

Get Started Today:

  1. Visit the Knowledge Base
  2. Set up your Solana-compatible wallet
  3. Earn your first badge through onboarding tasks
  4. Join governance and start voting on proposals

ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ Contributor Sprints

Sprint 1: Community Launch

November 18-29, 2025

Our first structured contributor sprint is underway! Join 20-30 contributors in building NeuroSwarm's future.

Sprint Goals:

  • Onboard 25+ new contributors with Bronze badges
  • Complete 50+ contributions across all project areas
  • Launch 3 working groups with active participation
  • Achieve 60% contributor retention to next sprint

Sprint Structure:

  • Duration: 2 weeks
  • Daily Schedule: Standups at 9 AM UTC, workshops 10 AM-12 PM, mentored work 1-5 PM
  • Tracks: Bug Bash, Documentation, Feature Development, Design & UX

Register: getblockchain.tech/neuroswarm/sprints
